dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.
dependencies.name: freetype

dependencies.description: External WGl and Windows OpenGL emulation representation in Spack
dependencies.name: gl

dependencies.description: The OpenGL Extension Wrangler Library.
dependencies.name: glew

dependencies.description:
OpenGL Mathematics (GLM) is a header only C++ mathematics library for
graphics software based on the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL)
specification
dependencies.name: glm

dependencies.description:
The macromolecular transmission format (MMTF) is a binary encoding of
biological structures. This repository holds the C++-03 compatible API,
encoding and decoding libraries.
dependencies.name: libmmtf-cpp

dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.
dependencies.name: libpng

dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.
dependencies.name: libxml2

dependencies.description: A small, fast binary interchange format convertible to/from JSON
dependencies.name: msgpack-c

dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C++ distribution.
dependencies.name: netcdf-cxx4

dependencies.description: MessagePack (de)serializer.
dependencies.name: py-msgpack

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Pmw is a toolkit for building high-level compound widgets, or
megawidgets, constructed using other widgets as component parts.
dependencies.name: py-pmw

dependencies.description:
Schrodinger's Fork of Python megawidgets with essential patches applied.
Pmw is a toolkit for building high-level compound widgets, or
megawidgets, constructed using other widgets as component parts.
dependencies.name: py-pmw-patched

dependencies.description:
PyQt is a set of Python v2 and v3 bindings for The Qt Company's Qt
application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt
including Windows, OS X, Linux, iOS and Android. PyQt5 supports Qt v5.
dependencies.name: py-pyqt5

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
PyMOL is a Python-enhanced molecular graphics tool. It excels at 3D
visualization of proteins, small molecules, density, surfaces, and
trajectories. It also includes molecular editing, ray tracing, and
movies. Open Source PyMOL is free to everyone!
name: py-pymol

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
